short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that removes all like/retweet/favorite counters. Because you are worth more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the likes/retweet/follower counters from sites like twitter, facebook, and instagram. We do this because you are worth more than the number of likes on the page and you are loved beyond what people tell you.
